name: Brekmoor - Cave Of Eternal Brawl
description: Brekmoor - Cave Of Eternal Brawl is a small 1 vs 1 duel game with nice pixel grapics and chiptune sound. You play as a warrior who is fighting different enemies. The core of the game is controlled via only one button. You have different click patterns to execute different action. Also a small leaderboard is integrated to save your personal top scores.
